definition: to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from

sentences.english: Time of recirculating and eluting must be over 3 h.
sentences.chinese: 回流洗脱时间一定大于3小时。

sentences.english: C8 capillary column, DAD and gradient elution.
sentences.chinese: C8的毛细管柱，爸爸和梯度洗脱。

sentences.english: The sample concentration and the ratio of elution solution which influence the separation effect of PC and PE were further researched.
sentences.chinese: 考察了进样浓度和洗脱液配比对分离效果的影响。

sentences.english: This allows quantitative elution of three of the four analytes as one sharp peak .
sentences.chinese: 这使得定量洗脱四种分析物中的三种产生一个尖锐峰。

sentences.english: The conditions of adsorption and elution of mercury on amidoxime chelate fiber are studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了胺肟螯合纤维吸附汞的条件以及汞的洗脱。

sentences.english: The recovery of WO3 was sharply increased with the increase of elution times after removing molybdenum.
sentences.chinese: 除钼反应后增加洗脱步骤可以显著提高WO3收率。

sentences.english: The eluate can be used repeatedly or by other methods.
sentences.chinese: 洗脱液可供多次或多种方法检测。

sentences.english: Secondly, type of elution was considered and type of isocratic elution was attempted firstly.
sentences.chinese: 第二是洗脱方式，可先用等度洗脱方式进行尝试。

sentences.english: Secondly, type of elution was considered and type of isocratic elution was attempted firstly.
sentences.chinese: 第二是洗脱方式，可先用等度洗脱方式进行尝试。

sentences.english: Flow rate had little influence on elution effectivity.
sentences.chinese: 流速对洗脱效果基本没有影响。

sentences.english: Objective To study the influence of eluent of different polarity on triptolide content.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究不同极性洗脱液对雷公藤内酯醇含量的影响。

sentences.english: Conclusion In tents of thrombosis, Drug- eluting stent is as safe as bare metal stent.
sentences.chinese: 结论药物洗脱支架的安全性与金属裸支架相似。

sentences.english: They are forced to escape, in order to elute the suspect, must solve the mystery of language.
sentences.chinese: 两人被逼逃命，为了洗脱嫌疑，必须解开语言之谜。

sentences.english: Ethanol solution is a kind of efficient eluent.
sentences.chinese: 乙醇水溶液是适宜的洗脱剂。

sentences.english: I am familiar with kinds of ion exchange resins, active carbon, carclazyte adsorption and so on.
sentences.chinese: 熟悉各种离子交换树脂活性碳白土吸附洗脱性能。

sentences.english: ResveratroL has been adsorbed with 60% ethanoL soLution may be a better eLution.
sentences.chinese: 白藜芦醇用60%的乙醇溶液可以较好的洗脱。

definition: to reverse a verdict/to present different views on a historical person or verdict
lit. to wash out a grievance/fig. to right a wrong/to redress an injustice
to frame sb (by planting sth on them)
to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
to exonerate/to clear (from an accusation)/to rehabilitate
to conspire to murder/to plot against sb's life
to impute/to shift the blame onto someone else
to right wrongs/to redress an injustice
